description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes in a React application, specifically for a Tic Tac Toe frontend. It includes CSS variables for light and dark themes, styles for various components such as the app, header, logo, and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container for the application that centers content and applies primary background and text colors based on the theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header of the App, which includes layout and color adjustments that respond to the theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including animations and sizing.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, adjusted based on the theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the button that toggles between light and dark themes, including hover and active states.
